Package progetto.view.commandline.states

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractCLViewState
    Abstract class extended by every state of the command line view
    ChairSelectionState
    State where the user can pick a chair
    ConfirmExitState
    State where the user can decide if he wants to close the game or not
    ContinueGameState
    State where the user can see the existing games and select one of them
    DefaultViewState
    First state shown at the beginning of the program
    EndGameViewState
    State shown at the end of a game
    FrameSelectionViewState
    State where the user can choose his window frame at the beginning of a game
    GameTransitionState
    Particular stage where during the game the right state is selected This is the state where the command line view goes when a state become "not still valid"
    PickDiceState
    State where the user can pick a dice from the extracted ones
    PreGameViewState
    State shown at the beginning of a game
    RoomsChoiceState
    State where the user can see the existing rooms and join one of them
    RoomsState
    State where the user can create rooms or ask to see the existing ones
    RoundViewState
    Stage shown when the user is the current player
    ShowPlayerBoardState
    State where the user can ask too see the playerboard of a player
    ShowToolCardState
    State where the user can see the available tool cards and can select one of them
    SocketRMIChoiceState
    State where the user can create a connection to the server
    UseToolCardState
    State in which the user can select the information needed to use the selected card
    WaitingState
    State where the user goes if he has selected his window frame and some other player hasn't yet
    WaitingTurnState
    State where the user goes when he isn't the current player
